MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KY10 postcode areas of Anstruther. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 3:30PM to safely carry out repair work on an underground cable fault outside 45 Shore street this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:48 PM on Tuesday, 09 March 2021.
